name: MLHandActionClassifier.VideoAugmentationOptions
desc: Options a hand action classification training session can use to generate additional training data from the videos you provide.

items.name: typealias MLHandActionClassifier.VideoAugmentationOptions.RawValue
items.desc: An associated value that defines the underlying type of an augmentation.

items.name: typealias MLHandActionClassifier.VideoAugmentationOptions.Element
items.desc: An associated value that defines the element of an augmentation.

items.name: typealias MLHandActionClassifier.VideoAugmentationOptions.ArrayLiteralElement
items.desc: An associated value that defines the element of an augmentation array literal.
